ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Every self is held in pledge against what it earned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Every soul is pledged to what it does,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Each one is a hostage to one's deeds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Every soul will be in captivity for its deeds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Every soul is mortgaged for its own deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Every person is a pledge for what he has earned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Every soul is held in pledge for what it earns,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Every soul shall be pledged for what it has earned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Every soul is a pledge for its own deeds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Every soul is held in pledge against its own deeds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Every soul will be a pledge for that which it hath earned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Every soul is hostage to what it has earned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Every soul will be (held) in pledge for its deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Every person is a pledge for what he has earned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Each soul is held in pledge for what it earns,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Every soul is hostage to what it has earned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:38] Every soul is held to ransom by what it earns, [it is] ransomed and requited for its deeds with the Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Every soul) every disbelieving soul (is a pledge) in the Fire for eternity (for its own deeds) which it has earned in its state of disbelief;
